title: Please ID this font
content:
Can somebody tell me what it is this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marescocompany_4910.jpg)

 [‹ Can you help me ID this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102713/http:/typophile.com/node/41798 "Go to previous forum topic") [Local Newspaper header "Mitt i" bold sans serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102713/http:/typophile.com/node/41791 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dominator69

comments.content:
Hi Marko,

looks like [Imperator](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102713/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/imperator.htm), a freebie by [Paul Lloyd](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102713/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/).  
F
